summary: Completed standardization of all remaining BeautyBooking module pages including report pages (revenue-breakdown, package-usage, top-rated, trending, loyalty-stats), admin booking calendar, vendor financial report, vendor retail orders, vendor subscription history, and all help pages. All pages now follow the consistent design pattern with standardized headers, card structures, table layouts, empty states, and pagination matching the Rental module design standards.
current_status: All BeautyBooking module pages have been standardized to match the design patterns of other modules (specifically Rental module). All page headers use the consistent format with page-header-title, page-header-icon, and proper flex layout. All tables use the standard table-borderless table-thead-bordered table-nowrap table-align-middle card-table classes. All empty states use the consistent empty--data structure. All pagination uses the standard page-area wrapper. Icon paths have been updated to use beauty/ prefix where appropriate. Final verification pending for responsive design and interactive elements testing.
